voice_response.begin: The reasons for the score of design ${design_id} are:
voice_response.repeat: stakeholder ${obj_name} has a value of ${obj_value} out of 1 and a weight of ${obj_weight}

visual_response.begin: The reasons for the score of design ${design_id} are:
visual_response.item_template: Stakeholder ${obj_name} has a value of ${obj_value}/1.0 and a weight of ${obj_weight}
